definition: to have bad luck/to be out of luck
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
erhua variant of 倒霉蛋[dao3 mei2 dan4]

sentences.chinese: 走好运与倒霉交替发生。

sentences.english: The poor unfortunate had starved to death .
sentences.chinese: 这个可怜的倒霉蛋是饿死的。

sentences.english: At first, Chan seems to be a pathetic patsy to Tuckers aggression.
sentences.chinese: 起初，成龙像是个老受塔克欺负的倒霉蛋。

sentences.english: Many misfortunes came on us during that harsh winter.
sentences.chinese: 在那个严峻的寒冬，很多倒霉事都让我们碰上了。

sentences.english: With what thoughts was the unfortunate man contending?
sentences.chinese: 那倒霉的副主教在哪些念头里挣扎？

sentences.english: "Unlucky people collapse under bad luck, " says Dr. Wiseman.
sentences.chinese: 怀斯曼医生说，“厄运来时，倒霉的人会崩溃。

sentences.english: This poor son of a gun would not yield.
sentences.chinese: 不过这个可怜的倒霉鬼没有屈服。

sentences.english: The first one to be killed was No. ?
sentences.chinese: 第一个被杀的倒霉蛋是？

sentences.english: As it would be unlucky to discuss one more superstition, we will wind things up here.
sentences.chinese: 既然再讲一个迷信会倒霉，那我们就在这里结束吧。

sentences.english: This is kind of an off-day for me, this doesn't normally happen.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说这算是倒霉的一天，平时不会发生这种事的。

sentences.english: I know darn well, he'll convince me that he's right again.
sentences.chinese: 我自认倒霉，他会说服我，他又是对的。

sentences.english: It’s very ill driving black hogs in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 在黑夜中赶黑猪是件非常倒霉的事。

sentences.english: Here is our poor street all riddled with balls. They are a pack of rascals.
sentences.chinese: 我们倒霉的街道被乱弹射击，这是一群无赖。

sentences.english: She was unlucky enough to draw kitchen cleanup twice in one week.
sentences.chinese: 她够倒霉的，在一周内两次抽签得下厨打扫。

sentences.english: Bad luck, I hope,won't hook on to me in two days.
sentences.chinese: 我希望这两天让我别碰上什么倒霉事。

definition: to run into/to come upon/to meet
erhua variant of 倒霉蛋[dao3 mei2 dan4]
to have rotten luck (stronger version of 倒霉[dao3 mei2])
the year's horoscope augurs ill (idiom); an unlucky year
